SEARCH
Module PIXL.POS
Package teampixl.com.pixlpos.database.api

Class StockAPI

java.lang.Object
teampixl.com.pixlpos.database.api.StockAPI
public class StockAPI extends Object
The StockAPI class is a singleton class responsible for managing stock items in memory. It provides methods to create, read, update, and delete stock items, as well as validation and search functionalities.
